  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2781</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Instruction Game -lesson plan</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Anweisung Spiel - Lektionplan</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le jeu d'instruction - plan de leçon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O jogo da instrução - planta da lição</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il gioco di istruzione - programma di lezione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το παιχνίδι οδηγίας - σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El juego de la instrucción - plan de la lección</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A lesson plan for an activity where students are required to understand and carry out instructionsin order to play a game.Includes and assessment rubric.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">listening skills</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">instructions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">grammar.</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Lektionplan für eine Aktivität, in der 
Kursteilnehmer benoetigt werden, instructionsin Ordnung zu verstehen 
und durchzuführen, um eine game.Includes und Einschätzung Rubrik zu 
spielen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un plan de leçon pour une activité où des 
étudiants sont requis de comprendre et effectuer la commande 
d'instructionsin pour jouer une rubrique de game.Includes et 
d'évaluation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma planta da lição para uma atividade onde os 
estudantes sejam requeridos compreender e realizar a ordem do 
instructionsin para jogar um rubric de game.Includes e de avaliação.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un programma di lezione per un'attività dove gli 
allievi sono tenuti a capire ed effettuare l'ordine di instructionsin 
per giocare una rubrica di valutazione e di game.Includes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα σχέδιο μαθήματος για μια δραστηριότητα όπου οι 
σπουδαστές πρέπει για να καταλάβουν και να πραγματοποιήσουν την 
κατάταξη instructionsin να παίξουν ένα παιχνίδι περιλαμβάνει 
και ρουμπρίκα αξιολόγησης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un plan de la lección para una actividad donde 
requieren a los estudiantes entender y realizar orden del 
instructionsin para jugar una rúbrica de game.Includes y del 
gravamen.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">hörende Fähigkeiten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anweisungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortschatz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grammatik.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">qualifications d'écoute</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
